title: INVESTIGATION AT THE INVESTIGATION INSTITUTE
description: Arriving at the Investigation Institute grounds, Deductive Logico was shocked by their budget. Their grounds had a hedge maze, an observatory, even a miniature golf course! This place could have hired half the detectives in the world. Why him? And who killed the groundskeeper?

suspects.name: CRYPTOZOOLOGIST CLOUD
suspects.description: He knows every sighting of Bigfoot, Yeti, Sasquatch, and also what the difference is.

suspects.name: HERBALIST ONYX
suspects.description: In her greenhouse, she's grown every kind of plant required in the culinary, magick, and poisoning arts.

suspects.name: CHEF AUBERGINE
suspects.description: It is said that she once killed her husband, cooked him, and then served him at her restaurant. It's not true, but just the fact that it's said about her tells you something.

weapons.name: A QUASI-PERPETUAL MOTION MACHINE
weapons.description: It doesn't run forever. More like two or three minutes.

weapons.name: A DOWSING ROD
weapons.description: You can find water, oil, and suckers with this.

weapons.name: HYPER-ALLERGENIC OIL
weapons.description: You read that right. Everyone is deathly allergic to this.

locations.name: AN IMPOSSIBLE HEDGE MAZE
locations.description: This was designed by the legendary M. C. Escher, so good luck getting out.

locations.name: THE OBSERVATORY
locations.description: For studying the stars, or having a romantic evening, or committing a murder.

locations.name: THE MINIATURE GOLF COURSE
locations.description: Eighteen holes, featuring windmills, caves, and loop-de-loops. The works!

clues: The second tallest suspect brought hyper-allergenic oil.
It turns out that a Libra was at the seventeenth hole when the murder was committed.

statements.speaker: Cryptozoologist Cloud
statements.statement: A dowsing rod was not in a hedge maze.

statements.speaker: Herbalist Onyx
statements.statement: A quasi-perpetual motion machine was not in the observatory.

statements.speaker: Chef Aubergine
statements.statement: Herbalist Onyx brought a quasi-perpetual motion machine.
